group_1.narration: It's a disaster! I came in this morning@and they were all over the classroom!@We've got our hands full moving the logs@and we need your help cleaning up...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? The old school building isn't decorated.

group_1.textRight: We won't be using it for the actual festival, this@is mainly for storing materials.
...You're on the committee, so you ought to@at least know that.

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...
I'm starving, so I can't think straight...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*...please don't pick up and eat anything@off the ground.

group_1.textLeft: For times like these...chocolate bars!
Do you want some too, Manaka?

group_1.textRight: No thanks.
We've just arrived at the classroom where the@trouble was reported.

group_1.textLeft: *Munch Munch*...*Gulp*...!@[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:302401:cheek_0][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302401:motion_0][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]Sugar replenishment complete!
Sorry for the delay! I'm Tsumugi, a member of@the organizing committee!

group_1.textRight: Why are there mushrooms growing on the@desks?!

group_1.textLeft: There are even mushrooms on the chalkboard!@No, mushrooms all over the classroom!
Does that mean we can eat all we want?!

group_1.textRight: Don't be ridiculous and take this seriously!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
...Thank you, Manaka.
I almost fell into the culprit's trap...

group_1.textRight: What trap...?

group_1.textLeft: The culprit is trying to...
...interfere with our preparations by stalling us@with an all-you-can-eat mushroom trap!

group_1.textRight: ...The only one who would fall for that is you...

group_1.textCenter: Huh? I didn't know both of you were on the@committee.

group_1.textLeft: Kanoko-senpai!

group_1.textRight: I'm not, I'm just helping out.

group_1.textLeft: What is Kanoko-senpai's class doing?
Is it "a food stall where you can enjoy@mushroom dishes grown in class"?
Yes, it was my idea!

group_1.textRight: ...I'll ask just in case, did you seriously grow@them everywhere?

group_1.textLeft: Of course not! We grew them on logs.
Look over there!
There's no more room in the next classroom!

group_1.textCenter: We'll just...take the rest of the logs to our@classroom.

group_1.textRight: I'm so relieved...the mushrooms I grew are@safe...

group_1.textLeft: See?
We moved most of our mushrooms elsewhere.

group_1.textRight: Then, what about all these mushrooms growing@in the classroom...?

group_1.textLeft: They just grew there naturally.

group_1.textRight: That's absurd!

group_1.textLeft: I think so too, but...that's what happened.

group_1.textRight: I wonder why?

group_1.textLeft: ...There was a big leak in the old school building@a while ago, wasn't there?

group_1.textRight: Yes, there was.
They've been repairing it.

group_1.textLeft: I guess that's why this whole classroom is@so dank.
And then I brought mushrooms into it, so...

group_1.textRight: You're saying the mushrooms just multiplied@on their own?

group_1.textLeft: Probably!

group_1.textRight: This is ridiculous...
In the first place, how did you not see this@coming before it actually became a problem?

group_1.textLeft: Everything was normal until yesterday...and@then I came here to find it like this today.

group_1.textRight: Normally, even in the right conditions, it'd take a@week...[chara:300901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300901:eyeClose_0][chara:300901:cheek_0][chara:300901:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300901:motion_0][chara:300901:lipSynch_1]You didn't do anything strange, did you?

group_1.textLeft: What...me? I don't think I did?

group_1.textRight: Well, nothing we can do about that!@Let's just clean this place up!
I'll do my best too, okay?

group_1.textLeft: You're a lifesaver! Thank you!

group_1.textRight: ...Oh yeah, did you inform your teacher?

group_1.textLeft: Oh...I only contacted the committee.

group_1.textRight: Then I'll go fetch her.
Tsumugi, please don't do anything unnecessary.

group_1.textLeft: I won't! I'll do my job!

group_1.textRight: Take care.

group_1.textLeft: Now, let's clean up properly.

group_1.textRight: By the way, are you gonna use these@mushrooms for the school festival?

group_1.textLeft: No, we won't.
We'll only use the mushrooms that we grow@ourselves.
That's the whole concept!

group_1.textRight: ...After we pull out all the mushrooms growing@here...

select.textSelect: Let's just grill them and eat!
It'd be a waste to throw them away,@can I take some home with me?

group_4.textRight: ...After we pull out all the mushrooms growing@here...

select.textSelect: Let's just grill them and eat!
It'd be a waste to throw them away,@can I take some home with me?
